data.title: Charitable Foundation for Sun City
data.meta_description: The mission of the Foundation is to provide services that address the physical, cultural, educational and social needs of Sun City Roseville residents, beyond those services already provided by the Community Association.
data.text:
Our Mission Statement

The mission of the Foundation is to provide services that address the physical, cultural, educational and social needs of Sun City Roseville residents, beyond those services already provided by the Community Association.

​

Our motto is:

“Neighbors Helping Neighbors”

​

Our activities include fund raising, providing certain services and programs for Sun City residents, financially supporting the needs of the Community Association’s Sunshine Services organization and contributing toward the purchase of certain community capital assets.

​

The Foundation Receives no funds from the Sun City Roseville Community Organization. Our activities are conducted through the participation of community volunteers.

​

Foundation Provided Services

Home Maintenance

Loan of Décor Items

Survivor Planning Program

Alternate Living Planning

Foundation Funded Association Services

The Speaker Series

Foundation funding for Sun City Roseville Community Association Sunshine Services​

Medical Equipment Loans

Dial-A-Ride​

Foundation financial support enables Sunshine Services to sell residents discounted Arrow 10 ride tickets.
